transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ji?
Executive: Hello, good afternoon, good morning, ma'am.
Customer: Good morning.
Executive: Ma'am, Shahdab Bolandia, Mars account manager.
Customer: Ji, ji, sir, boliye.
Executive: Ma'am, aapne yaha pe concern raise kiya tha buylead ke regarding.
Customer: Haan, sir, maine complaint dali thi, mail kiya tha maine.
Executive: Haan.
Executive: To ma'am, kya dikkat hai, kya issue hai actually?
Customer: Sir, mainly to ye hai ki to sir jo lead aati hai na, pehle to ek matlab relevant jyada aati nahi hai, matlab itna time ho gaya, bahut kam relevant aayi hai.
Customer: Fir ab ek wo aaya, sir, itna inappropriate tha uska item aur usne jo mention kiya tha, laboratory glassware mention kiya tha usne.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Aur jab maine usse call pe baat kari to wo kuch aur hi maang raha tha.
Customer: Matlab aajkal jo wo jo hai, to kuch sexual item maang raha tha mujhse.
Customer: Aur maine usse samajhne ki koshish kari to bade usse, to mujhe samajh mein nahi aaya jab wo dal laboratory glassware raha hai, maang kuch aur raha hai.
Customer: To sir, aisi inquiry to humko nahi chahiye sir. Kal ko aap maine kara call mere hisab se koi aur bhi karega. To sir, ye to theek nahi hai na, wastage of time hota hai hamara bhi.
Customer: To hum ye chahte hain ki is tarike ki inquiry hamare paas na aaye.
Executive: Nahi ma'am, dekhiye main pata hai mujhe takriban 10 se 15 din ho gaye daily basis pe call karte hue sir ke paas. Lekin waha se kuch response aa hi nahi raha hai. Jab hum IndiaMART mein onboard hote hain na to waha pe ek welcome call generate hoti hai. Jispe hum guide karte hain ki IndiaMART ki services hum use kaise karte hain. Aur uske baad 10 din 10 se 12 din baad dusri ek welcome wo welcome call to generate hoti hai. Jo bhi aapko dikkat aa rahi hai jaise catalog correction mein kuch dikkat aa rahi hai ya to fir jo buyleads aa rahi hai wo irrelevant aa rahi hai. Haan ya to yaha pe hum ye guide karte hain ki humko kis type type ki buylead pe connect karna hai. Ye sari cheeze matlab guide karne ke liye welcome call to generate hoti hai. Main continuously 10 se 12 din ho gaye connect karte hue sir se jyada hi hoga kam nahi honge. Main daily do se teen call karta hu lekin sir ma'am call nahi uthti. Ma'am bataiye main kaise guide kar sakta hu?
Customer: Okay, okay. Agar aisa hai na sir to main baat karti hu staff mein aur bolti hu is cheez ko. Matlab ye is tarike se to nahi hua khair. Agar aapko chahiye to call to uthani chahiye. Main baat karti hu office mein. Haan. Ab ye ma'am jo primary number hai yaha pe 70 last mein 081 hai. Ye kiska number hai? Jispe aap call karte hain jis, ek minute line pe rehna, main aapko batati hu. Kispe call karte hain aap?
Executive: Hmm, ma'am, starting mein 70 se start hai aur last mein 081 hai.
Customer: 081.
Executive: Ji.
Executive: Ma'am, aap boliye to main pura number repeat kar deta hu kaha.
Customer: Okay, ma'am, sir, ek hum isko code karana chahe to code ho sakta hai kya ye? Matlab kisi aur number ko mention kar sakte hain isme?
Executive: Mention kar sakte hain, koi dikkat nahi hai. Yaha pe jaise sir se meri baat hoti hai, sir ne bola tha ki ek kaam.
Customer: Main, main samajh rahi hu. Main baat karti hu, ye actually sir ka number hai, sab rehte hain busy. To ho sakta hai is wajah se phone nahi uthta hai. Agar agar main baat karti hu agar wo dekhenge to wo dobara matlab is cheez ko dekhenge ki bhai ye IndiaMART walon ka number hai, isko kab karenge. Agar nahi kar payenge to main change karaungi to change ho jayega kya?
Executive: Haan, change ho jayega ma'am. Uske ek OTP jayega is number pe. Waha pe OTP dalkar aap yaha pe number change kar sakti hain. Aur uske baad se jo number aap dalenge wo primary number ho jayega. Ab uske baad se call jayegi, meri agar call jayegi to mostly usi number pe jayegi. Aur yaha pe secondary number bhi add hai. 70 se start.
Customer: Ye kis ka number hai?
Customer: Sir, aap haan, aapko kabhi aap priority do aap second wale number ko do, first wale number ko mat dijiye sir. Jab aapko call karni hai IndiaMART se related IndiaMART se knowledge dene ke liye jo bhi aapka calling wagera rehti hai aap dusre number ko preference dijiye. Wo staff pick up karega, sir nahi kar paate kyunki sab busy rehte hain thoda.
Executive: Wo staff se.
Executive: To ma'am, abhi present time pe yaha pe jo hai welcome call to generate hai. Ab mujhe video call karna hai buyleads ke regarding issue aa rahi hai. Ab buyleads nahi aati kaam ki. To ma'am, ab iske main kis pe connect karu?
Customer: Abhi chal rahi hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Irrelevant buyleads received.

- Customer received inappropriate inquiry.

- Executive's calls not being answered.



Resolution:

- Executive acknowledged the issue.

- Executive explained welcome call process.

- Executive offered to change primary number.

- Customer agreed to prioritize secondary number.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will speak to staff about call pick-up.

- Customer will consider changing primary number.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, inappropriate inquiry, welcome call, primary number, secondary number
